title: George Melies cinema magician
creator_credit: Blackhawk Films, Patrick Montgomery and Luciano Martinengo
brief_description: Cinema’s first genius, Georges Melies, was a professional magician who quickly realised that the camera offered the best illusion machine in the world. Renowned for his trick films, he was actually the first to tell complete stories on film and the first to use the camera effects considered standard today
